isis.stitle: TRW MANUAL STEERING GEAR - GENERAL INFORMATION - COLUMN ALIGNMENT

svcproc.title: COLUMN ALIGNMENT
svcproc.para: On Integral Input Shaft/Steering Wheel Column type gears, the alignment of the column is of paramount importance. THE STEERING COLUMN MUST NOT BE SPRUNG IN ANY DIRECTION FROM ITS FREE POSITION. To determine whether misalignment exists, release upper column bracket and note if the column moves to a different position, its free position. If it does, it has been out of line and should be re-clamped in the new position or the condition corrected by other methods provided by the vehicle manufacturer.

note.para: If the column has been permanently bent because of severe misalignment, the above test may not be reliable, and replacement will be necessary.
